评论详情: SUNGAIT has found its niche: idenitfy a product that most people have, want, or even need; make it with the finest quality you are able at an economic price point; offer it with subtle variatiions in colors to suit multiple tastes; sell it for pennies and run circles around chic but really no better products that sell for four or five times as much. How they have managed to construct well-built, comfortable shades that fit almost every head—and market them at a price that keeps them in business—is a mystery I won't try to solve it. I'll just enjoy what they've done and will probably buy more pairs in the months and years to come. Just think: in 1964 these sunglasses would have set you back $1.67.

评论详情: I ordered a two-pack (tortoise shell and black), and I agree with everyone else that the fit is great and that they seem like a great value for their price. However, I was recently wearing them when the brown ones literally popped off my face. I thought one of the plastic sides had snapped off, but actually the little screw that holds the earpiece onto the frame popped out. Another woman and I searched endlessly for the tiny screw since I think it just needed to be popped back in. Unfortunately, we couldn’t find it so I have an unwearable pair now. I’m thinking maybe this one was just poorly made?  UPDATE: Previously gave this product a 3-star rating, but I’ve since upgraded my rating to 5 stars based on the seller’s response, which I received the day after I wrote my review. I was informed of their lifetime warranty and was offered either a full refund or a replacement. Given how comfortable these sunglasses are (and how I’ve been missing them!), I requested the replacement. Looking forward to having these in my car again as my driving sunglasses!

评论概述: You get what you pay for

评论详情: I ordered 4 pairs, one came in the three pack and another single.  Upon pulling out the single pair, I noticed it was significantly narrower than the name brand ones. I opened the other three, (tortoise, black and gray) but I actually received two pairs of black instead of gray. I had to loosen the screws a bit because they were so hard to open and were squeezing my temple area too much. I had high hopes, but the amount of extra glare that you can see inside these lenses (reflection of your eye/temple area) is extremely noticeable.  I'll probably wait for the name brand to have a black friday sale :(

类型: Color: 2 Pack (Polarized): Matte Black/Gray+glossy Pink Brown/Light-brown
评论详情: Extremely pleased with these polarized sunglasses. They are very comfortable, they fit perfectly from the get-go. No squinting while driving. LOVE THEM!
